attributes.action: Stop Child & Family Benefits Payments To Families Not Resident in UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Child & other family benefits are being paid to EU migrant workers, working in the UK for families not even living with them here, resulting in millions of pounds leaving this country each month.  Close this loophole so that unless ALL family members being claimed for are actually permanently living in this country, they cannot claim nor receive child benefit, tax credit, child tax credit, or any other related benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
